meanings.definition: A type of fabric with a raised pattern.
meanings.sent1: I love the soft feel of the bize on my favorite sweater.
meanings.sent2: The curtains were made of a beautiful bize that added elegance to the room.
meanings.sent3: The bize fabric whispered secrets to the curious cat playing hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: Her dress, like a field of bize flowers, swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The bize material was as cozy as a hug from a teddy bear.

meanings.definition: To make a buzzing or humming sound.
meanings.sent1: The bees bize around the hive on a sunny day.
meanings.sent2: The old refrigerator would bize loudly at night.
meanings.sent3: The toy robot bized happily as it moved across the floor.
meanings.sent4: The city streets bized with the energy of a thousand conversations.
meanings.sent5: The wind made the leaves bize like a gentle lullaby.

meanings.sent1: My aunt runs a cozy bize selling handmade soaps.
meanings.sent2: The local bize on the corner always has the freshest pastries.
meanings.sent3: The bize next door had a sign that read, 'Cat Cafe - Meow or Never.'
meanings.sent4: In the world of big corporations, her bize was a tiny bize of joy.
meanings.sent5: Starting a bize is like planting a seed and watching it grow into a tree.
